title: The Invincible Me Just Wants To Be Ordinary
alternative_title: The Invincible Me Just Wants To Be Ordinary; 无敌的我只想当个凡人
status: The Invincible Me Just Wants To Be Ordinary; 无敌的我只想当个凡人
description:
Description :
        Read The Invincible Me Just Wants To Be Ordinary / After transmigrating to the world of immortal cultivation, Shui Wuyu discovered that he had an invincible ability, but he didn't expect that once he used it, his lifespan would be consumed. In order to survive, Shui Wuyu decided to become a mortal. However "I just want to be a mortal!! Why do you all want to mess with me!!!" [Since the author completes a comic alone, it will take a long time to update. Please understand~]
